subject: Re: Order #SSN2405, how did it go?
description_text: Hello, I’d love to give the products a rating but I’ve still not received them yet. Thank you James Sent from my iPhone On 3 Sep 2025, at 19:36, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote: ﻿ Hello James, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello James, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional Plus X P2-H2 / Black / Baseplate Dislike it Love it! Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) Dislike it Love it! Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi James,      We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. We have identified a 10-day stagnation in the logistics tracking, but the issue has now been resolved. We shall urge the courier service to prioritise your delivery.

Hello,

I'm just wondering if you knew when the parcel might arrive please? The map
shows it being in London Canada, rather than London UK, which I think is
just wrong. The tracking website shows it is in the UK and in transit but
doesnt suggest any time frame of what day it might get to me?

Any help would be greatl;y appreciated.

Thank you

James

On Thu, 4 Sept 2025 at 03:45, service@simsonn.com
Hello, I notice that the parcel has been delivered. May I ask whether you have received your parcel?

Hello, Yes thank you, it arrived yesterday.

James

On Wed, 10 Sept 2025 at 08:59, service@simsonn.com
Okay, thank you for your confirmation.
